Louise Barnes (a mụrụ na 26 Eprel 1974) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri. Barnes nwetara nkwanye ùgwù na South Africa maka ọrụ dị iche iche na ihe nkiri na usoro telivishọn ndị e mepụtara na mpaghara
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri egwu South Africa / UK nke afọ 2009, Surviving Evil, nke ya na Billy Zane, Christina Cole na Natalie Mendoza sonyere
O mekwara Miranda Barlow na 2014 American telivishọn usoro Black Sails, nke Michael Bay na Jonathan E
A mụrụ Barnes na KwaZulu-Natal ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Witwatersrand na Honours Degree na Dramatic Art
Ya na di ya na nwa ya nwanyị bi na Johannesburg
O nwere mgbe o nwere ụlọ ọrụ ahụike mgbe ọ nwetachara ọzụzụ na United States dịka onye nkuzi nke Bikram yoga
O nwetala otuto dị egwu maka arụmọrụ ya na usoro Scandal! nke o ritere ihe nrite SAFTA maka Best Actress in a TV Soap
Barnes emeela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na usoro ndị South Africa mepụtara gụnyere Egoli, 7de Laan, Binnelanders, Scandal!, Sorted, Suburban Bliss, S.O.S
na South African / Canadian co-production Jozi-H
Ọ pụtara na 2014 American television series Black Sails, nke o nwetara otuto dị egwu maka arụmọrụ ya
Ntụrụndụ kwa izu na-akpọ àgwà ya "intriguing" na "mysterious". Ọ maliteghachiri ọrụ ya na oge nke abụọ nke e mere na Cape Town, South Africa ma gosipụta ya n'afọ 2015.
